Summary: two or more lights atop clouds
divs: sighting detailsi was working outside when a band of storms was coming in from the west, one the day or a day after katrina went into new orleans. the sun was behind the clouds but atop the clouds i saw tw or three lights spaced far apart. i couldnot see the source of the lights but i saw the beams, like when you shine a flashlight through fog. the lights themselves would swing around and change in size, like they were searchlights, and being refocused.from the way they swung around i thought the source was above\behind the clouds. i saw them until the rain clouds came over then they were hidden.
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around August 26th 0001
